alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 9:03PM MST until January 07 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST SUNDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 3500 feet near Grand Canyon, North Rim, Page and Valle. * WHEN...Until noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to snow and reduced visibility. * SNOW TABLES...Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to noon Sunday: Grand Canyon 4 to 6 inches North Rim 5 to 9 inches Page Up to 1 inch Valle 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: If travel is essential, allow for extra drive time and use caution. For the latest road conditions and closures...call the ADOT freeway management system at 1 888 411 7623 or visit their web site at www.az511.com. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward
